message.raw:
Configure labscript suite repos to have an update hook that deletes .pyc files
and empty folders.

This configuration is checked and applied whenever labscript_utils is imported,
and runs when hg update is run.

This helps avoid trouble when leftover .pyc files from the wrong branch or
possibly even wrong Python version are importable even though their .py files
are gone.
